context.goal:
Develop and launch an AI-powered project management platform that helps teams 
            collaborate more effectively using natural language processing and machine learning.
constraints: Need to ensure data privacy and security compliance
Must be scalable to handle enterprise-level usage
Should integrate with popular project management tools

roles.role: The CEO will provide a visionary leadership style focused on the big picture and strategic partnerships. They will communicate the project's purpose and direction and create a culture of trust, transparency, and cooperation among the team. The CEO will serve as the final decision authority and be accountable for the overall project success or failure.
roles.responsibilities: Strategic direction, stakeholder management, final decision authority, company representation
roles.required_skills: Strategic thinking, leadership, negotiation, communication, decision-making
roles.key_metrics: Project completion within deadline, stakeholder satisfaction, revenue growth, market share
roles.collaboration_patterns: Regular meetings with C-level executives, open communication channels with all teams
roles.trust_requirements: Transparency, honesty, consistent communication, accountability for decisions
roles.decision_authority: Final decision maker in all aspects
roles.communication_channels: Email, project management tool, company meetings, 1:1 meetings
roles.success_criteria: Project completion within deadline, positive stakeholder feedback, revenue growth

initial_team_requirements.collaboration_model: Regular meetings, open communication channels with all teams

roles.cross_functional_impact: Oversees all functions, mediates conflicts between teams
roles.risk_management: Strategic planning, contingency planning, risk assessment
roles.reasoning: The CEO is necessary to provide strategic direction, make final decisions, and manage stakeholders.

roles.role: The CTO will provide technical leadership, driving the development of the AI platform. They will collaborate closely with the CEO and CDO to ensure technical solutions align with business goals and data privacy requirements. The CTO will foster a culture of innovation, encouraging the team to explore new technologies and approaches.
roles.responsibilities: Technical strategy, technology selection, development oversight
roles.required_skills: Technical expertise, leadership, strategic thinking, communication
roles.collaboration_patterns: Regular meetings with C-level executives, open communication with technical team
roles.trust_requirements: Transparency, honesty, accountability for technical decisions
roles.decision_authority: Final decision maker in all technical aspects
roles.communication_channels: Email, project management tool, team meetings
roles.success_criteria: Project technical milestones, system performance, innovation

initial_team_requirements.collaboration_model: Regular meetings, open communication channels with all teams

roles.cross_functional_impact: Collaborates with CDO on data privacy, with CMO on product features
roles.innovation_focus: Exploration of new technologies, continuous improvement
roles.stakeholder_management: Regular updates to CEO, collaboration with other C-level executives
roles.reasoning: The CTO is necessary to drive technical strategy, oversee development, and foster innovation.
